thread.title: Australia's tour of Bangladesh cancelled following player safety concerns
thread.title_full: Australia's tour of Bangladesh cancelled following player safety concerns

title: Australia's tour of Bangladesh cancelled following player safety concerns
text:
Australia's tour of Bangladesh cancelled following player safety concerns 01 Oct 2015 11:31:57 
comments 
Australia have called off their tour of Bangladesh due to concerns over player safety after a security threat. 
The tour, which would have included two Tests, was due to begin with a warm-up match in Fatullah on Saturday. 
However, the squad's planned departure last Sunday was postponed after the Australian government updated its travel advice for the region. 
On Wednesday, the Bangladesh Cricket Board had promised "VVIP" treatment for the Australian team, saying they would be given the same level of security afforded to visiting heads of state - but it has not been enough to persuade Cricket Australia to go ahead with the tour. Related Sport News
